page.shortlink: api a5 is email valid function
page.description: The A5_IS_EMAIL_VALID() function reports whether email addresses are properly formatted. Multiple email addresse should be separated by commas or semicolons.

argument.name: result
argument.description: .T. = Indicates that the email address format is correct. .F. = Indicates that the email address format is incorrect.

argument.name: email_address
argument.description: One or more email addresses separated by commas or semicolons.
